articles.title: iPhone 18 Pro, iPhone 18 Pro Max Display Sizes Shared By Tipster, Flagships To Feature LTPO Panels With A Circular Punch-Hole Cutout, Signaling An End To The Pill-Shaped Design - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple could introduce a major design change to the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max, with a tipster revealing the panel sizes of the two models
articles.content: Apple is yet to introduce the iPhone 17 family, and we are already stumbling upon the specifications of the iPhone 18 Pro and iPhone 18 Pro Max. On this occasion, a tipster has revealed the display s… [+2285 chars]
